comments:
Steps:
- Workspace was in a path that has spaces: i.e. "c:\Documents and Settings\sshaw\..."
- Try to resolve a pathmap doing something like:
Resource resource = resourceSet.getResource(URI.createURI(MY_RESOURCE_PATH), true);
